content.text: Match ends, Celta de Vigo 0, Recreativo 3.
Second Half ends, Celta de Vigo 0, Recreativo 3.
Goal!  Celta de Vigo 0, Recreativo 3. Juan Villar (Recreativo) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Dani.
Offside, Recreativo. Asen tries a through ball, but Raúl Cámara is caught offside.
Substitution, Recreativo. Dani replaces Pablo Sánchez.
